headline: IBM Solution Drives Innovation in Defense Application: Stock to Gain?
summary: Lockheed Martin is set to incorporate International Business Machines' Granite Large Language Models to expedite AI innovation in aerospace and defense domains.

headline: Lockheed Unveils Astris AI to Provide AI Solutions Across Industries
summary: LMT's Astris AI brings secure and simplified AI solutions for U.S. defense and commercial industry sectors with high assurance needs.

headline: Taiwan Is Getting Its U.S. Weaponry—but Years Behind Schedule
summary: The five-year wait for the arrival of 38 Abrams tanks to Taiwan highlights the strains on U.S. industrial capacity as concerns grow over China.

raw.headline: Taiwan Is Getting Its U.S. Weaponry—but Years Behind Schedule

headline: More Men Are Addicted to the ‘Crack Cocaine’ of the Stock Market
summary: A new type of addict is showing up at Gamblers Anonymous meetings across the country: investors hooked on the market’s riskiest trades.  At Gamblers Anonymous in the Murray Hill neighborhood of Manhattan, one man called options “the crack cocaine” of the stock market.  Another said he faced hundreds of thousands of dollars in trading losses after borrowing from a loan shark to double down on stocks.
